hymn.title: I have found, I have found the way

O friends in the de -- sert past, Come, join in pray -- er and praise; E'en now He waits our cry, The Sav -- ior who saves al -- ways.

lyrics.stanza: I have found, I have found the way Which leads to heav'nly rest; I have found, I have found the peace Which filled my Savior's breast. O friends in the desert past, Come, join in prayer and praise; E'en now He waits our cry, The Savior who saves always.

Long, alas! in the gloom I fought, 'Mid strife of wind and waves; Jesus seemed only this to me: A Savior who sometimes saves. But sweet are the light and calm That fill my happy days, Since now I fully trust The Savior who saves always.

O my Sun and my Shield art Thou Lead on where Thou hast trod; My Salvation, my Joy, my Song, My Brother, and yet my God. Whate'er then my life betide, I now can trust and praise; Each moment Thou wilt save, O Savior, who sav'st always.
